definitions.definition: Vigilant or on one's guard against danger or difficulty.
examples: Stay aware ! Don't let your guard down.

definitions.definition: Conscious or having knowledge of something; awake .
examples: Are you aware of what is being said about you?
Gotta get going. I wasn’t aware that it was already so late.

main_definition: Vigilant or on one's guard against danger or difficulty.
secondary_definitions: Conscious or having knowledge of something; awake .
